photosynthesis: Mokhoa oo limela li sebelisang khanya ea letsatsi, metsi le CO2 ka oona ho hlahisa lijo (glucose)
phefumoloho ea cellular: Mokhoa oo ka oona lisele li senyang tsoekere ho ntša matla
mitochondria: Li-organelles liseleng tse ikarabellang bakeng sa phefumoloho ea cellular
chlorophyll: 'mala o motala limela o monya khanya ea letsatsi bakeng sa photosynthesis
dna: Deoxyribonucleic acid, molek'hule e jereng boitsebiso ba liphatsa tsa lefutso
rna: Ribonucleic acid, molek'hule e kenyang protheine synthesis
protheine: Molek'hule e entsoeng ka li-amino acid, e etsang mesebetsi e fapaneng ea 'mele
enzyme: Protheine e potlakisang tšebetso ea lik'hemik'hale 'meleng
sele: Motheo oa bophelo, motheo oa motheo oa lintho tsohle tse phelang
lesela: Sehlopha sa lisele tse tšoanang li sebetsa 'moho ho etsa mosebetsi o itseng
setho sa mmele: Sehlopha sa lisele tse sebetsang hammoho ho etsa mosebetsi o itseng
tsamaiso ea setho: Sehlopha sa ditho tse sebetsang mmoho ho etsa mosebetsi o rarahaneng
homeostasis: Bokhoni ba ntho e phelang ho boloka tikoloho e tsitsitseng ea ka hare
ho ikamahanya le maemo: Phetoho setsheding se se thusang ho phela le ho ikatisa tikolohong ya sona
tlhaboloho: Mokhoa oo palo ea lintho tse phelang e fetohang ka eona ha nako e ntse e ea
khetho ea tlhaho: Ts'ebetso eo ka eona libōpuoa tse nang le litšobotsi tse loketseng tikoloho ea tsona li nang le monyetla oa ho phela le ho ikatisa
ikholoji: Boithuto ba hore na lintho tse phelang li sebelisana joang le tse ling le tikoloho ea tsona
tikoloho: Sechaba sa lintho tse phelang le tikoloho ea tsona e sa pheleng e sebelisanang
biosphere: Karolo ea Lefatše e tšehetsang bophelo
taxonomy: Lekala la biology le sebetsanang le ho arola lintho tse phelang
morphology: Lekala la biology le amanang le boithuto ba sebopeho le sebopeho
physiology: Lekala la biology le sebetsanang le boithuto ba tšebetso le lits'ebetso linthong tse phelang
autotroph: Sebōpuoa se ka hlahisang lijo tsa sona ka ho sebelisa khanya kapa lik'hemik'hale (mohlala, limela)
heterotroph: Sephedi se fumanang dijo ka ho ja dintho tse ding (mohlala, diphoofolo)
mohlahisi: Sebōpuoa se hlahisang lintho tse phelang (mohlala, limela)
moreki: Sebōpuoa se jang lintho tse phelang tse hlahisoang ke lintho tse ling (mohlala, liphoofolo)
decomposer: Sebōpuoa se pshatlang lintho tse shoeleng le lintho tse phelang (mohlala, li-fungus, libaktheria)
baahi: Sehlopha sa dibopuwa tsa mofuta o le mong tse phelang sebakeng se itseng
sechaba: Sehlopha sa batho ba fapaneng ba sebelisanang sebakeng se itseng
biome: Tikoloho e kholo e nang le limela le liphoofolo tse ikhethang (mohlala, lehoatata, meru ea pula)
mefuta-futa ea lintho tse phelang: Mefuta e fapaneng ea bophelo Lefatšeng maemong ohle, ho tloha ho liphatsa tsa lefutso ho isa ho tikoloho
kotsing: Mefuta e kotsing ea ho fela
fela: Mefuta e seng e le teng
